scripts.build:icons: cross-var rimraf src/components/$npm_config_directory && cross-var svgr -d src/components/$npm_config_directory svgs-fixed/$npm_config_directory --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:icons-with-context: cross-var rimraf src/components-with-context/$npm_config_directory && cross-var svgr -d src/components-with-context/$npm_config_directory svgs-fixed/$npm_config_directory --config-file templates/context.svgrrc.js && cross-var rimraf src/components-with-context/$npm_config_directory/*/[!i]*.tsx
scripts.build:interface-icons: npm run fix:icons --directory=interface-icons && npm run build:icons --directory=interface-icons && npm run build:icons-with-context --directory=interface-icons
scripts.compile: npm run validate:icons && npm run build:interface-icons && npm run create-export-index-file
